description: Row sums of unsigned triangle A062138 (generalized a=5 Laguerre).
links: Harry J. Smith, Table of n, a(n) for n=0,...,100
Index entries for sequences related to Laguerre polynomials
formula: E.g.f.: exp(x/(1-x))/(1-x)^6.a(n)=sum(n!*binomial(n+5, n-m)/m!, m=0..n).a(n) = (2*n+5)*a(n-1) - (n-1)*(n+4)*a(n-2). - _Vaclav Kotesovec_, Oct 11 2012a(n) ~ exp(2*sqrt(n)-n-1/2)*n^(n+11/4)/sqrt(2). - _Vaclav Kotesovec_, Oct 11 2012
prog: (PARI) { f=1; for (n=0, 100, if (n>1, f*=n); a=f*binomial(n+5, n); g=1; a+=sum(m=1, n, f*binomial(n+5, n-m)/g*=m); write("b062192.txt", n, " ", a) ) } [From _Harry J. Smith_, Aug 02 2009]
author: _Wolfdieter Lang_, Jun 19 2001
